column2: Stop Drinking
[This.GetTitledFirstName], as a devoted Pelagian, is trying to learn to abandon [This.GetHerHis] harmful drinking habits.
Learn to Reject Empty Pleasures
column3: Apprendre à rejeter les plaisirs inutiles

column2: [This.GetTitledFirstName], as a devoted Pelagian, is trying to learn to reject emply pleasures.
Learn to Abstain from Excesses of the Flesh
column3: Apprendre à s'abstenir des excès de la chair
column6: Aprender a abstenerse de impulsos carnales.

column2: [This.GetTitledFirstName], as a devoted Pelagian, is trying to learn to abstain from excesses of the flesh.
Reject Cruelty
[This.GetTitledFirstName], as a devoted Pelagian, is trying to learn to reject cruelty.
Learn Temperance with Food
column6: Aprender a ser moderado con la comida

column2: [This.GetTitledFirstName], as a devoted Pelagian, is trying to learn to eat without excess.
Learn to Reject the Poison of Greed
column3: Apprendre à rejeter le poison de l'avarice
column4: Lernt, das Gift der Gier abzulehnen
column6: Aprender a rechazar el veneno de la codicia

column2: [This.GetTitledFirstName], as a devoted Pelagian, is trying to learn to reject the poison that greed brings to the mind.
Learn to Reject Envy
[This.GetTitledFirstName], as a devoted Pelagian, is trying to learn to reject the poison that envy brings to the mind.
Learn to Reject Hate
[This.GetTitledFirstName], as a devoted Pelagian, is trying to learn to reject the poison that hate and anger brings to the mind.
Learn to Reject Pride
[This.GetTitledFirstName], as a devoted Pelagian, is trying to learn to reject pride.
Defeat Fear
[This.GetTitledFirstName], as a devoted Pelagian, is trying to learn to defeat [This.GetHerHis] fear of the world and of the designs of others.
